question: Your ball is lying in a puddle in the fairway. How should you proceed?*

choices.text: You have to hit the ball where it is
Drop the ball within 1 club length from the nearest point of complete relief no nearer the hole without any penalty
You have to declare the ball unplayable, move it, and take a penalty
Pick the pall up, and place it at the edge of the puddle and play it from there

explanation: Drop the ball within one club length of the nearest point of relief, no closer to the hole, without penalty.
